# proximity_test { #genominterv.stats.proximity_test }

```python
genominterv.stats.proximity_test(
    query
    annot
    samples=10000
    npoints=1000
    overlap_as_zero=False
    span_as_zero=False
    two_sided=False
    cores=1
)
```

Test for proximity of intervals to a set of annotations.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

<code>[**query**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[pd](`pandas`).[DataFrame](`pandas.DataFrame`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   Data frame with query intervals.

<code>[**annot**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[pd](`pandas`).[DataFrame](`pandas.DataFrame`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   Data frame with annotation intervals.

<code>[**samples**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[int](`int`)]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [10000]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Number of bootstrap samples to use.

<code>[**npoints**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[int](`int`)]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [1000]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Number of points to use in the ECDF.

<code>[**two_sided**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[bool](`bool`)]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [False]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Whether to test for proximity in both directions.

<code>[**overlap_as_zero**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[bool](`bool`)]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [False]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Set distance to zero if one end of a query segment overlaps an  annotation segment, by default False. This does not apply to query segments embedded in or spanning one or more annotation segments.

<code>[**span_as_zero**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[bool](`bool`)]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [False]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Set distance to zero if a query segment spans a single annotation  segment, by default False.

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

<code>[]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[namedtuple](`collections.namedtuple`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   A named tuple with the test statistic and p-value.
